'''Large Atmospheric Vortexes''' are a type of [[Obstacle]] and exploration mechanic in found in Sumeru. They are stationary cylindrical objects that prevent the player from passing through them. Coming into contact with it can knock the player back but will not cause damage. They can be dispelled using [[Jinni in the Magic Bottle — Liloupar]].
